entry.title: BIP draft: HTLC transactions
entry.summary: Luke Dashjr, Peter Todd and Sean Bowe discussed Hash Time-Locked Contract (HTLC) transactions in Bitcoin on bitcoin-dev mailing list. HTLC transactions allow payment for the preimage of a hash with CSV/CLTV used to recover funds if the other party is not cooperative. The script takes a general form of [HASHOP] OP_EQUAL OP_IF ... OP_ELSE ... [TIMEOUTOP] OP_DROP ... OP_ENDIF OP_CHECKSIG. However, since the top item on the stack is hashed, scriptSig's that satisfy HTLC's are malleable. Luke Dashjr proposed using OP_SIZE to overcome this issue and Peter Todd applauded his idea as brilliant.
